output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a user to transfer more tokens than allowed, aka the 'wrong logic' issue.
Predictable buy function allows attackers to manipulate the contract's balance, aka the 'bad randomness' issue.
sell function allows attackers to manipulate the contract's balance, aka the 'access control' issue.
freezeAccount function allows attackers to freeze arbitrary accounts, aka the 'access control' issue.
